oai_dc:dc.dc:title: View of the Administration Building from Ave Maria Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arches; Ave Maria Hall; Educational facilities; Buildings; Barry Hall (Administration Building);
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ave Maria Hall preceeded Buckman Hall in its location to the south of the Administration Building. Note that only a parking lot can be seen to the rear of Administration, suggesting an early date for this photo.
